Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 63rd overall pick, by New Jersey in 1979...
Injured on 6/29/1979 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/8/1980 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 7/16/1984, off Stephen Paul (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/20/1985, off William Boswell (PG)...
Injured on 6/14/1986 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/5/1986 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from New Jersey to Malibu on 2/11/1988 (Going to NJ: CF P. Santana, P E. Witman. Going to Mal: 3B V. Green)...
